00037 const int colors[] = {kBlack, kRed, kGreen, kCyan, kBlue, kMagenta, kYellow, 
00038                       kGray+2, kOrange-3, kGreen+3, kCyan+3, kMagenta-5, 
00039                       kRed-2};
00040 const int ncolors = sizeof(colors)/sizeof(int);

00043 ProcessedPlotter::ProcessedPlotter() : 
00044   BaseModule(GetDefaultName(), 
00045              "Plot each channel's waveform and selected analysis results"),
00046   _graphix(0), _paused(false)
00047 {
00048   
00049   AddDependency<ConvertData>();
00050   AddDependency<RootGraphix>();
00051   //Register all the config handler parameters
00052   //RegisterParameter("multi_canvas",multi_canvas = true);
00053   RegisterParameter("chans_per_pad", chans_per_pad = 8,
00054                     "Maximum number of channels to stack on a single plot");
00055   RegisterParameter("overlay_analysis", overlay_analysis = true,
00056                     "Overlay the raw data with analysis module output (if only 1 channel in the pad)?");
00057   RegisterParameter("multi_color", multi_color = true,
00058                     "Draw with multiple colors?");
00059   RegisterParameter("draw_legend", draw_legend = true,
00060                     "Include a legend with the plot?");
00061   RegisterParameter("draw_title", draw_title = false,
00062                     "Draw a separate title on the pulses plot?");
00063   RegisterParameter("autoscalex", autoscalex = true,
00064                     "Set the scale of the x axis automatically?");
00065   RegisterParameter("autoscaley",autoscaley = true,
00066                     "Set the scale of the y axis automatically?");
00067   RegisterParameter("xmin", xmin = -10, "Minimum range of the x axis");
00068   RegisterParameter("xmax", xmax = 10, "Maximum range of the x axis");
00069   RegisterParameter("ymin", ymin = 0, "Minimum range of the y axis");
00070   RegisterParameter("ymax", ymax = 16383, "Maximum range of the y axis");
00071   RegisterParameter("subtract_baseline", subtract_baseline = false,
00072                     "Subtract the baseline before plotting?");
00073   RegisterParameter("downsample",downsample=1,
00074                     "Factor by which to downsample graphed waveforms");
00075   
00076   RegisterParameter("drawpulses",drawpulses = true,
00077                     "Enable drawing of raw pulses?");
00078   RegisterParameter("drawpmtweights",drawpmtweights = false,
00079                     "Enable drawing of PMT weights graph?");
00080   RegisterParameter("scale_pmts_sum",scale_pmts_sum = false,
00081                     "Scale PMT weights to sum (true) or max (false)");
00082   
00083   
00084   for(int i=0; i<NCANVASES; ++i)
00085     _canvas[i] = 0;
00086 }
00087 
00088 ProcessedPlotter::~ProcessedPlotter()
00089 {
00090   Finalize();
00091 }
00092 
00093 int ProcessedPlotter::Initialize()
00094 {
00095   EventHandler* evhandler = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00096   _graphix = evhandler->GetModule<RootGraphix>();
00097   if(!_graphix){
00098     //shouldn't happen...
00099     Message(ERROR)<<"ProcessedPlotter called Initialize, but no RootGraphix!\n";
00100     return 1;
00101   }
00102   
00103   //only draw pmt weights if there is pmt info from the database
00104   if(evhandler->GetCampaignInfo()->pmts.empty())
00105     drawpmtweights = false;
00106   //also disable pmtweights if not S1S2Evaluation
00107   S1S2Evaluation* eval = evhandler->GetModule<S1S2Evaluation>();
00108   if(!eval || !eval->enabled)
00109     drawpmtweights = false;
00110   
00111   if(!drawpulses && !drawpmtweights){
00112     Message(ERROR)<<"Processed plotter is enabled, but all draw functions "
00113                   <<"are disabled. Aborting\n";
00114     return 2;
00115   }
00116   
00117   if(drawpulses){
00118     _canvas[PULSES] = _graphix->GetCanvas();
00119     if(draw_title){
00120       //add a pad to hold the title
00121       RootGraphix::Lock glock = _graphix->AcquireLock();
00122       _canvas[PULSES]->Divide(1,2);
00123       _canvas[PULSES]->cd(1);
00124       double y=0.95;
00125       gPad->SetPad(0,y,1,1);
00126       TPaveLabel* subtitle = new TPaveLabel(0.08,0,0.92,1,"","NDC");
00127       subtitle->SetBorderSize(0);
00128       subtitle->SetBit(TObject::kCanDelete,true);
00129       subtitle->SetTextColor(kYellow);
00130       subtitle->SetFillColor(kBlue);
00131       subtitle->SetFillStyle(1001);
00132       subtitle->SetTextFont(62);
00133       subtitle->SetTextSize(1.1);
00134       subtitle->Draw();
00135       _canvas[PULSES]->cd(2);
00136       gPad->SetPad(0,0,1,y);
00137     }
00138   }
00139     
00140   if(drawpmtweights)
00141     _canvas[PMTWEIGHTS] = _graphix->GetCanvas();
00142   
00143   if(downsample < 1) downsample = 1;
00144   return 0;
00145 }
00146 
00147 int ProcessedPlotter::Finalize()
00148 {
00149   for(int i=0; i<NCANVASES; ++i)
00150     _canvas[i] = 0;
00151   return 0;
00152 }
00153 
00154 int ProcessedPlotter::Process(EventPtr event)
00155 {
00156   if(_paused) return 0;
00157   EventDataPtr data = event->GetEventData();
00158   Message(DEBUG3)<<"ProcessedPlotter: Acquiring graphics lock.\n";
00159   RootGraphix::Lock glock = _graphix->AcquireLock();
00160   Message(DEBUG3)<<"ProcessedPlotter: Successfully acquired graphics lock.\n";
00161   char title[30];
00162   sprintf(title, "Run %d - Event %d", data->run_id, data->event_id);
00163   if(drawpulses && _canvas[PULSES]){
00164     _canvas[PULSES]->SetTitle(title);
00165     TPad* pulsepad = _canvas[PULSES];
00166     if(draw_title){
00167       //draw the run+event label
00168       _canvas[PULSES]->cd(1);
00169       if(gPad->GetListOfPrimitives() && 
00170          gPad->GetListOfPrimitives()->GetEntries() == 1){
00171         TPaveLabel* label = (TPaveLabel*)(gPad->GetListOfPrimitives()->At(0));
00172         if(label){
00173           label->SetLabel(title);
00174           gPad->Modified();
00175         }
00176       }
00177       pulsepad = (TPad*)(_canvas[PULSES]->cd(2));
00178       if(!pulsepad){
00179         Message(ERROR)<<"ProcessedPlotter: Unable to find pulse pad!\n";
00180         return 1;
00181       }
00182     }
00183     pulsepad->Clear();
00184     //Organize pads by number of channels
00185     // get only the channels not excluded
00186     int nchans = 0;
00187     std::vector<ChannelData*> chans_to_draw;
00188     for( size_t ch = 0; ch < data->channels.size(); ch++){
00189       if( _skip_channels.find(data->channels[ch].channel_id) == 
00190           _skip_channels.end() ){
00191         nchans++;
00192         chans_to_draw.push_back(&(data->channels[ch]));
00193       }
00194       
00195     }
00196     
00197     int cpp = chans_per_pad;
00198     if(cpp < 1)
00199       cpp = (nchans > 0 ? nchans : 1);
00200     int total_pads = (nchans+cpp-1)/cpp;
00201     
00202     if(total_pads == 0)
00203       return 0;
00204     else if(total_pads == 1) {}
00205     else if(total_pads == 2)
00206       pulsepad->Divide(2,1);
00207     else if(total_pads < 5)
00208       pulsepad->Divide(2,2);
00209     else if(total_pads < 7)
00210       pulsepad->Divide(3,2);
00211     else if(total_pads < 10)
00212       pulsepad->Divide(3,3);
00213     else if(total_pads < 13)
00214       pulsepad->Divide(4,3);
00215     else if(total_pads < 17)
00216       pulsepad->Divide(4,4);
00217     else if(total_pads < 21)
00218       pulsepad->Divide(5,4);
00219     else if(total_pads < 26)
00220       pulsepad->Divide(5,5);
00221     else if(total_pads < 31)
00222       pulsepad->Divide(6,5);
00223     else if(total_pads < 37)
00224       pulsepad->Divide(6,6);
00225     else if(total_pads < 43)
00226       pulsepad->Divide(7,6);
00227     else{
00228       int rootpads = (int)(ceil(sqrt(total_pads)));
00229       pulsepad->Divide(rootpads,rootpads);
00230     }
00231     for(int pad=0; pad<total_pads; pad++){
00232       pulsepad->cd( (total_pads == 1 ? 0 : pad+1 ) );
00233       
00234       if( overlay_analysis && (cpp == 1 || nchans == 1) ){
00235         chans_to_draw[pad]->Draw(subtract_baseline, downsample,
00236                                  autoscalex, autoscaley, 
00237                                  xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax);
00238       }
00239       else{
00240         int chans_this_pad = std::min(cpp, nchans-pad*cpp);
00241         TMultiGraph* graphs = new TMultiGraph;
00242         graphs->SetBit(TObject::kCanDelete, true);
00243         TLegend* legend = 0;
00244         if(draw_legend && chans_this_pad > 1){
00245           legend = new TLegend(0,.9,1,1);
00246           legend->SetBit(TObject::kCanDelete, true);
00247           legend->SetNColumns(4);
00248           legend->SetColumnSeparation(-.3);
00249           legend->SetMargin(0.25);
00250         }
00251         
00252         for(int i = pad*cpp; 
00253             i < (pad+1)*cpp && i < nchans; i++){
00254           TGraph* g = chans_to_draw[i]->GetTGraph(subtract_baseline,downsample);
00255           if(!g) continue;
00256           if(multi_color && chans_this_pad>1){
00257             g->SetLineColor(colors[abs(chans_to_draw[i]->channel_id)%ncolors]);
00258             //int id = data->channels[i].channel_id;
00259             //g->SetLineColor(TColor::GetColor(85 * ((id&1)+(id&8)/8), 
00260             //85 * ((id&2)/2 + (id&16)/16), 
00261             //                             85 * ((id&4)/4 + (id&32)/32) ));
00262             g->SetMarkerColor(g->GetLineColor());
00263             g->SetFillColor(g->GetLineColor());
00264           }
00265           if(legend)
00266             legend->AddEntry(g, g->GetTitle(), "lpf");
00267           graphs->Add(g);
00268           if(chans_this_pad == 1)
00269             graphs->SetTitle(g->GetTitle());
00270           
00271         }
00272         
00273         graphs->Draw("alp");
00274         if(!autoscalex)
00275           graphs->GetXaxis()->SetRangeUser(xmin, xmax);
00276         if(!autoscaley)
00277           graphs->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(ymin, ymax);
00278         
00279         /*TAxis* yax = graphs->GetYaxis();
00280           if(yax)
00281           yax->SetLabelOffset(0);
00282           TAxis* xax = graphs->GetXaxis();
00283           if(xax)
00284           xax->SetTitle("sample time [#mu s]");
00285         */
00286         if(legend)
00287           legend->Draw();
00288         
00289       }
00290     }
00291     // update the last pad
00292     if(!autoscalex || !autoscaley )
00293       gPad->Modified();
00294     _canvas[PULSES]->cd(0);
00295     _canvas[PULSES]->SetSelected(0);
00296     //_canvas[PULSES]->Update();
00297     new PadZoomer(pulsepad);
00298   }
00299   if(drawpmtweights && _canvas[PMTWEIGHTS]){
00300     //Plot distribution of light on PMTs
00301     _canvas[PMTWEIGHTS]->Clear();
00302     _canvas[PMTWEIGHTS]->SetTitle(title);
00303     _canvas[PMTWEIGHTS]->Divide(2,2);
00304     double scale_s1 = 0;
00305     double scale_s2 = 0;
00306     if(scale_pmts_sum)
00307     {
00308         scale_s1 = data->s1_fixed;
00309         scale_s2 = data->s2_fixed;
00310     }   
00311     for(int pad=1; pad<=4; ++pad){
00312       _canvas[PMTWEIGHTS]->cd(pad);
00313       std::vector<TEllipse*> circles;
00314       double maxsize = 0;
00315       for(size_t ch=0 ; ch < data->channels.size(); ++ch){
00316         ChannelData& chdata = data->channels[ch];
00317         
00318         double amp = (pad%2 ? chdata.s1_fixed : chdata.s2_fixed);
00319         if(!scale_pmts_sum)
00320         {
00321             scale_s1 = (pad%2 ? std::max(amp, scale_s1): scale_s1);
00322             scale_s2 = (pad%2 ? scale_s2 : std::max(amp, scale_s2));
00323         }
00324         
00325         if( (chdata.channel_id < 0) || 
00326             ( pad>2 && chdata.pmt.photocathode_z > 0) ||
00327             ( pad<=2 && chdata.pmt.photocathode_z < 0) )
00328           continue;
00329         double x = chdata.pmt.photocathode_x;
00330         double y = chdata.pmt.photocathode_y;
00331         double r = sqrt(x*x + y*y);
00332         double cathode_r = sqrt(chdata.pmt.photocathode_area/3.1415927);
00333         maxsize = std::max(maxsize,r+cathode_r);
00334         //use the theta parameter to store the ellipse's amplitude
00335         circles.push_back(new TEllipse(x,y,cathode_r,cathode_r,0,360,amp));
00336       }//end loop over channels
00337       //draw the x,y axes
00338       maxsize *= 1.1;
00339       std::string title="S1 ";
00340       if( pad%2==0 ) title = "S2 ";
00341       if( pad < 3)   title += "TOP";
00342       else           title += "BOTTOM";
00343       if( (pad%2 && !data->s1_fixed_valid) || 
00344           (pad%2==0 && !data->s2_fixed_valid) ) title += " INVALID";
00345       double scale = (pad%2 ? scale_s1 : scale_s2);
00346       TH2F* axes = new TH2F(title.c_str(),title.c_str(),
00347                             100,-maxsize*1.1,maxsize, 100,-maxsize,maxsize);
00348       //fill an invisible bin to set the scale
00349       axes->Fill(0.,0.,scale);
00350       axes->SetStats(0);
00351       axes->SetBit(TObject::kCanDelete, true);
00352       axes->Draw("colz");
00353       
00354       //set the PMT marker colors and draw them
00355       int ncols = TColor::GetNumberOfColors()-1;
00356       for(size_t i=0; i<circles.size(); ++i){
00357         TEllipse* el = circles[i];
00358         el->SetBit(TObject::kCanDelete,true);
00359         int colornum = (int)(el->GetTheta()/scale * ncols);
00360         el->SetFillColor(TColor::GetColorPalette(colornum));
00361         el->Draw();
00362       }
00363       if(pad == 2 && data->bary_valid){
00364         //draw the xy barycenter
00365         TMarker* bary = new TMarker(data->bary_x, data->bary_y, 29);
00366         bary->SetMarkerSize(3);
00367         bary->SetMarkerColor(kYellow);
00368         bary->SetBit(TObject::kCanDelete,true);
00369         bary->Draw();
00370       }
00371     }
00372     _canvas[PMTWEIGHTS]->cd(0);
00373     //_canvas[PMTWEIGHTS]->Update();
00374   }
00375 
00376   return 0;
00377 }
00378 
00379 
00380 const TCanvas* ProcessedPlotter::GetCanvas(int i) const
00381 { 
00382   if (i == 0 || i == 1) 
00383     return _canvas[i]; 
00384   else
00385     {
00386       Message(ERROR)<<"ProcessedPlotter::GetCanvas()"<<std::endl
00387                     <<"Attempt to access non-existent canvas"
00388                     <<std::endl;
00389       return NULL;
00390     }
00391 }
